扭.definition: to turn; to twist; to wring; to sprain; to swing one's hips

扭傷.definition: a sprain; a crick; to sprain

扭打.definition: to wrestle; to grapple; to scuffle

扭扭捏捏.definition: affecting shyness or embarrassment; coy; mincing (walk, manner of speech); mannered

扭捏.definition: affecting shyness or embarrassment; coy; mincing (walk, manner of speech); mannered

扭曲.definition: to twist; to warp; to distort

扭結.definition: to tangle up; to twist together; to wind

扭腰.definition: to sway one's hips; to twist one's waist

扭虧.definition: to make good a deficit; to reverse a loss

扭虧為盈.definition: (idiom) to get into the black; to become profitable

扭蛋.definition: toy in a capsule (dispensed from a vending machine)

扭轉.definition: to reverse; to turn around (an undesirable situation); (mechanics) torsion

扭轉乾坤.definition: lit. to upend heaven and earth (idiom); fig. to change the course of events; to turn things around

扭頭.definition: to turn one's head; to turn around
